Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object

      • authenticate

        public boolean authenticate(java.lang.String nameOrEmail,
                            java.lang.String pwd,
                            java.lang.String remoteAdress)
        Method to authenticate a user. The user is identified with his name or email.
        Created on 14.01.2017 by Lukas Dratwa
        Parameters:
        nameOrEmail - - the name or email of the user
        pwd - - the password
        remoteAdress - - the remote adress of the request
        Returns:
        true if the user could signed in, false if not

      • getUserWithSession

        public User getUserWithSession(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Method to get a User with a HttpSession. (When the user sign in, the referenced Session is saved in the user object.)
        Created on 14.01.2017 by Lukas Dratwa
        Parameters:
        session - - the session
        Returns:
        found User or null

      • isUniqueUser

        public boolean isUniqueUser(User inputUser)
        Method to check if a name or email is already used by another user.
        Created on 14.01.2017 by Lukas Dratwa
        Parameters:
        inputUser - - the User you want to create / save / check for uniqueness
        Returns:
        true if unique

      • isRemoteAdressAlreadyInUsage

        public boolean isRemoteAdressAlreadyInUsage(java.lang.String remoteAdress)
        Check if there is already a signed in user with the given remote address
        Created on 24.01.2017 by Lukas Dratwa
        Parameters:
        remoteAdress - - the address
        Returns:
        true if there is already a signed in user with the given ip

                              double initialBalance,
                              UserType userType,
                              java.lang.String hometown)
        Method to create and save a User in the database.
        Created on 14.01.2017 by Lukas Dratwa
        Parameters:
        name - - the name (unique!)
        pwd - - the password
        birthday - - the birthday
        gender - - the gender
        email - - the email (unique!)
        initialBalance - - the initial balance of the UserCredit
        userType - - the UserType
        hometown - - the hometown
        Returns:
        the created user
